rules.name: myRule_13
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ((3 AND 4) OR 5) AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Need Identification?

rules.name: myRule_20
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR (2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7))
rules.label: Design Approval Needed?

rules.name: myRule_22
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR (2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR (10 AND 11)) OR (12 AND 13) OR (14 AND 15) OR (16 AND 17) OR (18 AND 19) OR (20 AND 21))
rules.label: Finance Approval Needed?

rules.name: myRule_24
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2) OR 3) AND ((4 AND 5) OR 6) AND 7 AND 8 AND (9 OR 10)
rules.label: Ready to Deliver Proposal?

Flow.description: Control all pre-closed sales stage change logic

value.stringValue: "This Opportunity is ready for Proposal Delivery. formulas.expression: "This Opportunity is ready for Proposal Delivery.
